bibl.title: Some Thoughts on Exchange Systems in the Red Sea Region and Indian Ocean.
bibl.note: Merchants and ways of communication. - Some products of exchange (spices and aromatics; - cultivated plants; - resins: copal and amber; - cornelian). - Economic modelling. - Conclusion. - References.

bibl.title: People of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project II Held in the British Museum, October 2004

bibl.seg: PLISSON Gwendoline, Some Thoughts on Exchange Systems in the Red Sea Region and Indian Ocean.

Janet C.M. STARKEY (Ed.), People of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project II Held in the British Museum, October 2004 = Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 3 = BAR International Series. 1395 (Oxford, 2005) pp. 67-73.
Merchants and ways of communication. - Some products of exchange (spices and aromatics; - cultivated plants; - resins: copal and amber; - cornelian). - Economic modelling. - Conclusion. - References.
